item.title: Bright Mountain Media Inc 10-K
item.description: Bright Mountain Media Inc, which is in the Services-Computer Programming Services [7371] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 13, 2022 had 30423 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 506 instances 2021 - 303 instances stock - 292 instances 2020 - 290 instances 31 - 226 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
